= Passive Collector
:toc:
:toclevels: 2

== Purpose

Deploy Zeek or Suricata in listen‑only mode to capture protocol‑level
telemetry without interfering with traffic.

== Engines

* Zeek
* Suricata

== Mode

* Listen‑only (no packet injection)

== Data Pipeline

* Collector → normaliser → Verisim temporal (bitemporal)
* Collector → graph enricher → Arango (path/ASN)
